Please adhere to follow the below mandatory preparations to ensure a smooth count process.

 

*	Ensure sales integration issues such as OMS / FAR FETCH / E-COM / X-store etc. if any, must be cleared before stock take by raising an IT SR request.
*	Stock mismatch between RMS v/s SIM & RMS v/s SIOCS and vice versa must be cleared by raising an IT incident.
*	RESA errors must be checked and cleared before stock take by Store managers.
*	Mall permit must be applied by the store team as per id’s shared.
*	Ensure all items must have a barcode to scan. Though items look same, the team would scan every single item one by one to ensure the accuracy of scanning.
*	Ensure all barcodes should be OUTSIDE and exposed to frontside for its proper scanning.
*	Ensure all Pending Transactions such as Transfers / PO / SAD / RTV / Manual Invoice etc.. must be completed 3 days prior to the count.
*	Ensure wrong barcodes especially on the plastic cover of items must be removed to avoid wrong scanning of it.

*	Ensure wrong barcodes especially on the plastic cover of items must be removed to avoid wrong scanning of it.
*	Ensure any lay away items such as Marketing / Photoshoot / Press loan / Staff Uniform etc.. must be taken prior approval from Area Manager to add manually into the count.
*	Confirmation from Supply chain / Back office that RESA errors are cleared in system in advance to avoid unnecessary variance during stock count.

Please adhere to follow the below mandatory preparations to ensure a smooth count process.

 

*	Ensure sales integration issues such as OMS / FAR FETCH / E-COM / X-store etc. if any, must be cleared before stock take by raising an IT SR request.
*	Stock mismatch between RMS v/s SIM & RMS v/s SIOCS and vice versa must be cleared by raising an IT incident.
*	RESA errors must be checked and cleared before stock take by Store managers.
*	Mall permit must be applied by the store team as per id’s shared.
*	Ensure all items must have a barcode to scan. Though items look same, the team would scan every single item one by one to ensure the accuracy of scanning.
*	Ensure all barcodes should be OUTSIDE and exposed to frontside for its proper scanning.
*	Ensure all Pending Transactions such as Transfers / PO / SAD / RTV / Manual Invoice etc.. must be completed 3 days prior to the count.
*	Ensure wrong barcodes especially on the plastic cover of items must be removed to avoid wrong scanning of it.

*	Ensure wrong barcodes especially on the plastic cover of items must be removed to avoid wrong scanning of it.
*	Ensure any lay away items such as Marketing / Photoshoot / Press loan / Staff Uniform etc.. must be taken prior approval from Area Manager to add manually into the count.
*	Confirmation from Supply chain / Back office that RESA errors are cleared in system in advance to avoid unnecessary variance during stock count.

Please adhere to follow the below mandatory preparations to ensure a smooth count process.

 

*	Ensure sales integration issues such as OMS / FAR FETCH / E-COM / X-store etc. if any, must be cleared before stock take by raising an IT SR request.
*	Stock mismatch between RMS v/s SIM & RMS v/s SIOCS and vice versa must be cleared by raising an IT incident.
*	RESA errors must be checked and cleared before stock take by Store managers.
*	Mall permit must be applied by the store team as per id’s shared.
*	Ensure all items must have a barcode to scan. Though items look same, the team would scan every single item one by one to ensure the accuracy of scanning.
*	Ensure all barcodes should be OUTSIDE and exposed to frontside for its proper scanning.
*	Ensure all Pending Transactions such as Transfers / PO / SAD / RTV / Manual Invoice etc.. must be completed 3 days prior to the count.
*	Ensure wrong barcodes especially on the plastic cover of items must be removed to avoid wrong scanning of it.
*	Ensure any lay away items such as Marketing / Photoshoot / Press loan / Staff Uniform etc.. must be taken prior approval from Area Manager to add manually into the count.
*	Confirmation from Supply chain / Back office that RESA errors are cleared in system in advance to avoid unnecessary variance during stock count.

*	Ensure sales integration issues such as OMS / FAR FETCH / E-COM / X-store etc. if any, must be cleared before stock take by raising an IT SR request. Store Managers for visibility and action.
*	Stock mismatch between RMS v/s SIM & RMS v/s SIOCS and vice versa must be cleared by raising an IT incident. for visibility & action.
*	RESA errors must be checked and cleared before stock take by Store managers &
*	Mall permit must be applied by the store team as per id’s shared.
*	Ensure all items must have a barcode to scan. Though items look same, the team would scan every single item one by one to ensure the accuracy of scanning.
*	Ensure all barcodes should be OUTSIDE and exposed to frontside for its proper scanning.
*	Ensure all Pending Transactions such as Transfers / PO / SAD / RTV / Manual Invoice etc.. must be completed 3 days prior to the count.
*	Ensure wrong barcodes especially on the plastic cover of items must be removed to avoid wrong scanning of it.
*	Ensure any lay away items such as Marketing / Photoshoot / Press loan / Staff Uniform etc.. must be taken prior approval from Area Manager to add manually into the count.
*	Confirmation from Supply chain / Back office that RESA errors are cleared in system in advance to avoid unnecessary variance during stock count.
